Annually, employees at the Singapore site come together to celebrate and
reaffirm K&S’ unwavering commitment to Quality, Environment, Health & Safety 
(QEHS), and Corporate Social Responsibility. The slogan for the event in 
FY2019 was:Promoting Safety, Quality and Environment
“Safety is OUR Priority
Quality is OUR Standard
Environment is OUR Responsibility.”The two day QEHS event features a series of activities, game booths, 
retail booths and competitions to emphasize the three pillars organized by 
a committee consisting of the EHS, Quality and representatives from all 
departments.The QEHS event received over 400 employees participation where 
they had fun participating in the games, workshops and competitions, winning 
gifts and prizes and at the same time gaining knowledge on work safety, eating 
healthily, being eco-friendly and keeping consistent quality standards.
